channel.title: What the F... happend?
channel.description: I've been gone in this community for a few good months. and now i look back and there is no one left.

item.title: What the F... happend?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:39, topic:544615”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=663490.msg4434605#msg4434605 date=1404622968]

Yep, and in those few months we’ve saw considerably more changes to the sites source code than at any other point.
[/quote]what sort of changes? besides the portal/spoiler tag

Didn’t we upgrade the forum software or something?

No-one really cares that they upgraded the forum software. People want changes like the god damn theme![/quote]

I like it this way

Read full topic

item.title: What the F... happend?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:26, topic:544615”]1. Runescape as a whole has become much less popular
2. A lot of the original members have outgrown this game
3. The quality of most RSPS servers have diminished to that of leaches and quick cash grabs[/quote]

Pretty much summed up why I never come here anymore. I visited some old runescape clan forums and it amazes me how many clans have actually totally disappeared but the “inner circles” of the clans are still friends on a certain level. I went and visited RBH and truebeaver and gang still cracking up like a bunch of hormonal teenagers even though they are now all in their 20’s/30’s.

I’m kind of shocked Runescape even had a RuneFest.

Read full topic

item.title: What the F... happend?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:27, topic:544615”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=663490.msg4434342#msg4434342 date=1404520202]

  1. Runescape as a whole has become much less popular
  2. A lot of the original members have outgrown this game
  3. The quality of most RSPS servers have diminished to that of leaches and quick cash grabs
    4. Sini puts people down and makes them quit.

Plus, I think if this forum was a bit more selective on what constitutes as a “server advertisement” it would look much more professional. Half the threads look like they’re infected with RATS.
[/quote]

[/quote]
<3

Read full topic

item.title: What the F... happend?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:23, topic:544615”]It wasn’t really unexpected tbh… People grow up. Moparscape is still known only for Runescape Pivate Servers and they’re starting to die out (or at least there’s less people interested in them).

I like this place though. I wish I could be nearly as good in programming as some of the people here are but I don’t really have the dedication.[/quote]
I personally think Moparscape should slowly transition into a general gaming and programming forum. We already have Minecraft, so maybe add other boards for console games etc.

At least that way the forum won’t just die out.

Moparscape could be the epicentre for private servers

Read full topic

item.title: What the F... happend?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:21, topic:544615”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=663490.msg4434170#msg4434170 date=1404446943]
its always been toms fault.
[/quote]this.

[quote author=Tree link=topic=663490.msg4434227#msg4434227 date=1404475183]
It’s not as fun as it used to be when you could hop on and stir up new members.
Now it’s just a few people monitoring Mopman’s social issues.
[/quote]Shout outs to Mopman, he’s a nice guy, hope he takes more of a driving role on the forums.

[quote author=Ashi link=topic=663490.msg4434210#msg4434210 date=1404460253]
Now if I was admin…
[/quote]I don’t want you anywhere near such a role.

[quote author=sinisoul link=topic=663490.msg4434163#msg4434163 date=1404444345]
<3 Tom
[/quote]Pretty much.

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=663490.msg4434154#msg4434154 date=1404442312]

[quote author=casey. link=topic=663490.msg4434153#msg4434153 date=1404441935]
Tom happened. That F…er
[/quote]

The math checks out.
[/quote]Plot twist: it’s the date we made you a moderator.

[hr]

As stated before by sinisoul, Tom gets the hard job, he makes the hard decisions so it’s really easy to criticize him about some of the stuff he does. It’s hard to maintain balance on a forum full of degenerate social misfits (lol!). I hope he stays with us for a long time and hopefully we can work out some new advertising campaign.

holla at all ma niggas
tom wuddup i c u[/quote]

Yeah I love moppy. I agree, Tom is fine.

[quote=“Cres, post:23, topic:544615”]It wasn’t really unexpected tbh… People grow up. Moparscape is still known only for Runescape Pivate Servers and they’re starting to die out (or at least there’s less people interested in them).

I like this place though. I wish I could be nearly as good in programming as some of the people here are but I don’t really have the dedication.[/quote]

Agreed. It’s a shame most people don’t feel as though they can contribute anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: What the F... happend?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ll actually make a topic shortly detailing how to set the forum up and provide anything that’s required to do so. Obviously the scattered approach that’s being undertook at the moment is detrimental to any progress.

UPDATE: So turns out you need more than the general table structure, I’m part way through merging the structure file and some insert queries so people should be able to import the new SQL file and have it all work right away.

Read full topic

item.title: What the F... happend?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Svitkona, post:15, topic:544615”]Well we also added :palm: that never happened under another admin before![/quote]Didn’t MITB add that himself?

[quote=“Tom, post:14, topic:544615”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=663490.msg4434176#msg4434176 date=1404447743]

Yep, and in those few months we’ve saw considerably more changes to the sites source code than at any other point.
[/quote]what sort of changes? besides the portal/spoiler tag

I don’t get where you’re going with this? I said there’s been considerably more source code changes than at any other point. That statement is still true even using just the examples you provided. Also while it’s true I have a platform setup to make changes I’ve posted the SQL structure of the forum on here before and the files can be found on github (linked above) so in reality I have just as much access to make changes as any of you do.

Other changes like themes I’ve commented on in their respective topics.[/quote]I wasn’t “going” anywhere, I was curious what other changes were made. I assumed it was more than that because those two changes aren’t actually more, considering the SMF changes MITB did himself for things like minecraft, different site splits/merges, SMF updates, etc. Also where is the SQL structure? Does it include the actual data for some of the things like the site settings?

Read full topic
